Tender Title: Generator and Floodlight Trailer Rental

Tender Reference Number: WS3543236394-Doc3543292635
Amendment Number: 4

# Background
Pursuant to the acquisition of goods and services by the Department of National Defence (DND), the following Request for Standing Offer (RISO) has been issued:

# Scope of Work
The Department of National Defence (DND) at Garrison Wainwright, Alberta, requires the provision of labour, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision necessary for the rental and related servicing/maintenance of various-sized Generators and Trailer-Mounted Floodlights on “as required” basis.

## Description of Goods/Services
The equipment is required for military exercises in Alberta, as well as for domestic emergency situations as needed. The majority of the requirements will be for 3 CDSB Detachment Wainwright, however, there may also be requirements for Garrison Edmonton and/or other Alberta locations.

# Tender Requirements
响The following requirements must be met for the Request for Standing Offer:

- region of opportunity: Wainwright, Alberta
- regions of delivery: Wainwright, Alberta
- procurement category: SRV
- notice type: Offer to supply
- procurement method: Competitive - Open bidding
- selection criteria: Lowest Price

# Procurement Schedule

The tender reference number is WS3543236394-Doc3543292635, and the worst date for delivery of goods and services is 2027-12-14.  

# Important Notice
- The closing date and time for the submission of bids is November 3, 2022 at 1400 MDT.
- Late bids will not be accepted.

# Eligibility
The offeror must have an existing requirement and is requesting to be designated as a RISO contractor at Garrison Wainwright. 

# Contracting Authority
The Contracting Authority for this RISO is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) located in Gatineau, Quebec.
